WorkItem.Description:
My DK's health doesn't change when I add the ICC buff. The health is still showing a value 30% below what I actually see in ICC.
Â 
If this isn't just a display issue then I imagine it has a significant effect on the gear choices made by the Optimization.
WorkItem.Summary: [Feature Request.TankDK] Update Stats to show Buffed values v Special Effects

Comments.Message: This is as intended.  The goal of the stat info is to mirror what is displayed in the armory or without any buffs.  When I was factoring buffs into displayed data, it was confusing to most users.  ICC buff is being factored into the gear evaluations though.
Excellent.   Would it be possible to put one of the little mouseover things that says health with selected buffs = XXXXXX?
Would it be possible to offer up 'buffed' and 'unbuffed' tabs, then?
Would it be possible to have 'buffed' and 'unbuffed' versions, that show their respective values buffed and unbuffed (possibly even self-buffed)?
Sorry about the triple comment, delete the first and third if you can, I didn't realize it showed newest at the top (helpful for new people though, so they don't necro).

Shaz, please change this to display buffed stats on the Stats tab. What shows up on the armory is of no relevance to us.
Preferably, show the constant level of stats, without temporary special effects, and show the average value after special effects in a tooltip, but that's not necessary; just the average value after special effects is fine.
I need to do some more clean up for this, but it works now.
